Ivan Toms (Julaị 11, 1952 na Machị 25, 2008) bụ dọkịta South Africa, onye lụsoro ọchịchị oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọgụ dị ka onye a ma ama na-emegide ịkpa ókè megide ịkpa ókè. N'oge ọnwụ ya n'afọ 2008, Toms na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi ahụike maka obodo Cape Town, South Africa.

A mụrụ Ivan Toms na Cape Town n'ụbọchị 11 Julaị 1952. Ọ natara akara ugo mmụta ọgwụ na Mahadum Cape Town n'afọ 1976. Ọ gara Glenwood High School na Durban site n'afọ 1965 ruo afọ 1969.
Ọ bụ osote onye isi n'afọ 1969
Enwere ike ịchọta okwu otuto nye Ivan na: https://web.archive.org/web/20160916112842/http://www.glenwoodhighschool.co.za/node/3493.

E debara aha Toms n'ọrụ mba na South African Defence Force (SADF), dị ka dọkịta na-abụghị onye agha n'afọ 1978. Ọ megidere ebumnuche nke SADF, mana ọ jụrụ ịhapụ South Africa. Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ n'ime ọnwa isii ya dị ka dọkịta na Namibia, nke a maara mgbe ahụ dị ka South West Africa ma bụrụ nke South Africa na-achịkwa.
